text: I've been feeling really lost lately. It's like I don't know who I am anymore. The things I confessed to you weigh heavily on me.
Thank you for the talk today. I feel a bit better having shared my struggles with someone.
I'm not sure I can face my parents after what I've done. I'm so ashamed.
Sometimes I think volunteering is the only thing that makes sense to me anymore.
I appreciate the work you do, John. It's not easy to open up, but I'm glad I can talk to you.
